job_id.description: A unique identifier for the job posting.

job_title.description: The title of the job position.

company_name.description: The name of the company offering the job.

company_description.description: A detailed description of the company.

company_values.description: A list of the company's core values.

location.description: The location where the job is based.

city.description: The city of the job location.

state_province.description: The state or province of the job location.

country.description: The country of the job location.

postal_code.description: The postal or ZIP code of the job location.

remote_type.description: Specifies if the position is on-site, remote, or hybrid.

salary.description: Salary information for the job position.

currency.description: The currency of the salary (e.g., USD, EUR).

period.description: The salary period (e.g., per annum, per hour).

is_negotiable.description: Indicates if the salary is negotiable.

additional_compensation.description: Details about bonuses, commissions, or other compensation.

job_description.description: A summary of the job role and responsibilities.

responsibilities.description: A list of specific job responsibilities.

requirements.description: A list of job requirements and qualifications.

benefits.description: A list of benefits and perks offered.

job_type.description: The type of job position (e.g., Full-time, Part-time, Contract).

contract_duration.description: Length of the contract for contract positions.

working_hours.description: Details on working hours or shifts.

application_instructions.description: Instructions on how to apply for the job.

legal_statements.description: Legal disclaimers or equal opportunity statements.

additional_information.description: Any additional information relevant to the job posting.
